On the other hand, the IR/MAR plasmid that is described in the submitted article is already covered by an international patent (PCT/JP2005/020972). The plasmid is currently sold from Transgenic Inc. Japan, under the license from the patent owner, Hiroshima University. Any researcher may obtain it after purchasing the plasmid or after contracting with Hiroshima University for its usage. Therefore, this does not alter the authors’ adherence to all the PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials. Besides that, the authors have declared that no competing interests exist.
